title: All Ball - Doug's Elite 8 --> Final 4 Breakdown; Guest: 'Free Solo' Star Alex Honnold on Fear, Preparation and Making the Film
itunes:title: All Ball - Doug's Elite 8 --> Final 4 Breakdown; Guest: 'Free Solo' Star Alex Honnold on Fear, Preparation and Making the Film
description:
In this episode, Doug breaks down the Elite 8 NCAA Tournament action and the Final Four teams. His guest this week is 'Free Solo' climbing superstar Alex Honnold who opens up about his fearlessness, his mental approach, his future, the making of the massively successful film, and what to expect from his new climbing podcast. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
